channel.title: Explained on Drive Talks

item.title: Why Do American and European V8 Engines Sound Different? Crankshaft!
item.description: Time and time again the question “Which V8 sounds better?” has rolled of the tongues of most car enthusiasts. European V8s have a high revving loud note while American V8s have low raw rumble.
